name: Colour
description: An introductory course on colour that looks at its mechanics and interdisciplinary scope: from the history of science and culture to the technicalities of various colour spaces in both analog and digital environments. A combination of lectures, readings, and studio projects shape a broad understanding of both how colour has been used and how to use colour.
division: John H. Daniels Faculty of Architecture, Landscape, & Design
department: John H. Daniels Faculty of Architecture, Landscape, & Design
